thread.section_title: Bundle Stars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bundle Stars | www.bundlestars.com | 25 of 948
thread.title: James

author: James
title: James
text: I was mainly attracted to the Curve Bundle, which contained, among others, the game "Hue". The bundle at tier 3 was priced at $9.99, while "Hue" itself on Steam costs $14.99. So it was pretty much a no-brainer: get up to 10 games from Bundle Stars for less than the price of one from Steam. The payment transaction proceeded smoothly and I was able to redeem all the Steam codes immediately and without incident.
